statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_type FROM vehicle_maintenance ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, part_replaced, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE service_type='Oil Change'
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_type, part_replaced, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE cost > 100
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE part_replaced = 'Brake Pads';
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, part_replaced, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE service_type LIKE '%Oil%';
SELECT MAX(cost) AS max_cost, MIN(cost) AS min_cost, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance;
SELECT * FROM services;
SELECT service_id, vehicle_id, service_date FROM services WHERE cost < 100;
SELECT service_description, cost FROM services WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT service_id, service_date, cost FROM services WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_services, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM services;
SELECT service_id, vehicle_id, service_date, service_description, cost FROM services WHERE vehicle_id = 12345 ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM services JOIN parts_replaced ON services.service_id = parts_replaced.service_id WHERE service_description LIKE '%oil change%' ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT service_id, service_date, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM services GROUP BY service_id HAVING total_cost > 500;
SELECT service_description, COUNT(*) AS num_services FROM services GROUP BY service_description ORDER BY num_services DESC;

SELECT service_id, service_date, sum(part_cost) AS total_part_cost FROM services JOIN parts_replaced ON services.service_id = parts_replaced.service_id GROUP BY service_id ORDER BY total_part_cost DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM services;
SELECT service_name, service_type, cost FROM services WHERE service_date = '2021-10-05';
SELECT service_name, cost FROM services WHERE service_type = 'Repair' ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM services WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_date FROM services ORDER BY service_date DESC, service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM services ORDER BY service_date DESC, cost ASC;
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_type, cost FROM services WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT service_name, service_date, cost FROM services WHERE service_type = 'Repair' AND cost < 500;
SELECT service_type, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM services GROUP BY service_type;
SELECT services.service_id, services.service_name, parts_replaced.part_name, parts_replaced.part_cost FROM services JOIN parts_replaced ON services.service_id = parts_replaced.part_id;
SELECT * FROM services ORDER BY service_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, service_cost FROM services WHERE service_cost > 500 ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT service_id, service_type, service_description FROM services WHERE service_type = 'Maintenance' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM parts_replaced ORDER BY part_cost ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM services ORDER BY service_date DESC, service_cost ASC;
SELECT service_id, service_date, service_type FROM services WHERE service_cost > 500 ORDER BY service_date;

SELECT s.service_id, s.service_date, p.part_name, mc.total_cost FROM services s JOIN parts_replaced p ON s.service_id = p.service_id JOIN maintenance_costs mc ON s.service_id = mc.service_id WHERE mc.total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY s.service_date ASC;
SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, s.service_date, s.service_cost FROM vehicles v JOIN services s ON v.vehicle_id = s.vehicle_id WHERE v.vehicle_make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY s.service_date DESC;
SELECT v.vehicle_make, COUNT(s.service_id) AS num_services FROM vehicles v LEFT JOIN services s ON v.vehicle_id = s.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.vehicle_make ORDER BY num_services DESC;
SELECT * FROM Services;
SELECT service_name, service_date FROM Services WHERE mechanic_name='John Smith';
SELECT vehicle_id, part_name, part_cost FROM PartsReplaced ORDER BY part_cost DESC;
SELECT service_id, mechanic_name, service_description FROM Services WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_year > 2010 ORDER BY vehicle_make ASC
SELECT service_name, service_date, mechanic_name FROM Services WHERE mechanic_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT part_name, replacement_date, part_cost FROM PartsReplaced WHERE part_cost > 1000 ORDER BY part_cost DESC
SELECT mechanic_name, mechanic_phone, mechanic_email FROM Mechanics WHERE mechanic_specialization = 'Engine Repair'
SELECT * FROM CostsIncurred WHERE cost_type = 'Maintenance' AND cost_amount < 500 ORDER BY cost_date DESC
